long_description: These Grivel long flex bars are designed to replace the standard rigid bar included with Grivel G10, G12, Air Tech, or Air Tech Light crampons to provide enhanced flexibility on alpine terrain. The extra flexibility of these bars helps reduce foot fatigue, enhance traction and reduce stress on the bar. Designed to work only with Grivel crampon styles using either the Classic or New Classic binding systems. Ideal for long alpine approaches and glacier walking. Not suitable for vertical ice usage.
short_description: These Grivel long flex bars are designed to replace the standard rigid bar included with Grivel G10, G12, Air Tech, or Air Tech Light crampons to provide enhanced flexibility on alpine terrain.
